name: Hidden Objects USA Spy Quest
description:
Vacation Around the USA! Explore beautiful Travel Spots! MEGA fun Seek and Find game with 70+ Levels! 100’s of Objects to Find!

Enjoy Manhattan, Santa Monica, Chicago’s Downtown, Hollywood Sign, Texas, San Francisco, Colorado, Arizona, Las Vegas Hotels, New Mexico, Florida’s Coastline, Iowa, Maryland, Rhode Island, Vermont, Cape Cod, Georgia, Maine, New Hampshire, Seattle, Michigan, Connecticut and more!

Explore some of the USA’s Most Popular Travel Destinations without leaving Home!

Find Travel themed objects. Let the Brain Game Begin! FREE Mini Game!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, object quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Spot the Difference, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging adventure Around the USA is sure to entertain! Safe Travels!

Features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics
3 Ways to Play - Traditional, Chill, Adventure
45 Adventure Levels
42 Scenes in Chill
42 Scenes in Traditional
Brain Boost
Tap Image to Magnify Object
Zoom to Find Objects
Drag Scene and Magnify
Easy to Challenging
Bonus Words
Timed and Untimed Levels
FREE Hints
FREE Mini Game

3 Ways to Play Instructions:

TRADITIONAL-
Timed
Hints
Score
Picture, Word, Collector
42 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
No Time
Unlimited Hints
Picture, Word, Collector
42 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Timed
Unlimited Hints
Score
Bonus Words (highlighted)
45 Unique Levels
